summary:
Spotify is a popular way to listen to music and podcasts online. Started in Sweden in 2006, it now has over 600 million users worldwide. You can access Spotify on many devices, like phones, computers, and smart speakers. It offers a free version with ads and a premium version for a fee, which lets you download music and skip ads.

Spotify has a huge library with millions of songs and podcasts. Users can search by artist, album, or genre, and create custom playlists. It's available in most countries, with many users in the US and Europe. Spotify pays artists based on how often their music is streamed.
title: Spotify
